name: Breadcrumbs.io
headline: No-code scoring engine identifying your most engaged upsell opps
description: Breadcrumbs analyzes customer and prospect data to identify hidden revenue opportunities. It does this through a no-code scoring engine that can be set up in minutes rather than months. Because of Breadcrumbs sales teams can now focus on the right opportunity at the right time.

founders.name: Armando Biondi, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder & CEO @BreadcrumbsIO (previously Co-founder & COO @AdEspresso, sold to @Hootsuite). Investor in 150+ startups. Board Member @MailUpGroup and former Radio Host.

founders.name: Gary Amaral, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CPO at BreadcrumbsIO bringing years of experience in Demand Marketing from Blackberry, Canadian Tire, Hootsuite and Chargify.

founders.name: Massimo Chieruzzi, Founder
founders.description:
I sit between Marketing and Product. Passionate about SEO & Inbound marketing. Spaghetti coder.
CMO and CoFounder of Breadcrumbs
Prev. CEO & Cofounder of AdEspresso, sold to Hootsuite in 2016.

# Enterprise-grade ****lead scoring**** made for everyone
  * Optimize your entire funnel
  * Get up to 30% increased MQL to Opp
  * Full support for sales-assisted and PLG motions

Get a Demo
![](https://play.vidyard.com/xWdJAkSR7nxAqcPYopnoeN.jpg)
## Trusted by innovative companies like
[ ![Thinkific Logo](https://breadcrumbs.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Thinkific@2x.png) ](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/<https:/www.thinkific.com/>)
[ ![Bee Logo](https://breadcrumbs.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Bee@2x.png) ](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/<https:/beefree.io/>)
[ ![Agorapulse Logo](https://breadcrumbs.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/AgoraPulse@2x.png) ](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/<https:/www.agorapulse.com/>)

[ ![Mixmax Logo](https://breadcrumbs.io/wp-content/uploads/2022/11/Mixmax@2x.png) ](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/<https:/www.mixmax.com>)
## Introducing Copilot
Get started with your first lead-scoring model in seconds with the help of Breadcrumbs **Copilot.** Breadcrumbs will analyze your data and generate a suggested model with just a few simple clicks. You are still in control, you can make changes at any point, and it’s still super easy to understand, just insanely fast!
****Automate lead scoring with data-driven models****
  * 3-Click Lead Scoring Model Creation
  * Completely Transparent and Customizable
  * Full access to the entire Breadcrumbs Scoring Engine


[See how Copilot works](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/<https:/breadcrumbs.io/copilot/>)
![Screenshot Of Copilot](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20513'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Revenue opportunities out the wazoo
Why limit yourself to one or two models with legacy solutions? Build, Test, and Iterate freely with Breadcrumbs and use Lead Scoring to optimize all your revenue levers.
  * Unlimited workspaces and models eliminate false constraints
  * Build models for Acquisition, Expansion, Retention, and more
  * Run Multi-Variate tests without impacting operations or systems


[See how Breadcrumbs works](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/</product/features/>)
![Screenshot Of Compare Models](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20567'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Screenshot Of Reveal Tool](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20637'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Sales and marketing alignment, finally
Objective conversations replace the legacy of horse trading exercises between Marketing and Sales.
  * **Reveal** identifies predictive attributes with ML
  * **Compare** allows you to validate different hypotheses
  * **Copilot** empowers you to do all this in seconds


[See Breadcrumbs in action](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/</product/>)
## Turbocharge your stack
Breadcrumbs will help unlock the growth hiding across your tech stack. Our no-code connectors allow you to bring data together without begging for developer resources. Use this superpower to build models that surface your best prospects, customers prime for an upgrade, or the ones at risk of churning.
![Illustration Of The Breadcrumbs Scoring Engine | Accelerate Growth With Lead Scoring](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20353'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Works with your **tech stack** in just a few clicks
You have a wealth of data sitting in your tech stack! Get marketing, sales, and product data from your existing stack piped into Breadcrumbs in no time.

## Data democracy, delivered
Gone are the days of begging, borrowing, and stealing data and resources to power your marketing engine.
  * Native OAuth integrations into your core GTM stack
  * Powerful API for when you need it
  * Visualize Data from all your connected platforms in one place


[See how Breadcrumbs works](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/</product/features/>)
![Screenshot Of Dashboard](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20657'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Screenshot Of Explore](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201024%20592'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
## Business intelligence for real
Consolidating your GTM stack data with Breadcrumbs scoring intelligence allows you, the operator, a practical and actionable view of what is happening with your prospects, leads, and customers.
  * **Explore** provides a unified view across your GTM Stack
  * Trend analysis for marketing program optimization
  * Deep analytics at every level of the scoring engine


[See Breadcrumbs in action](http://www.breadcrumbs.io/</product/>)
![Icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20150%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Sales assisted, PLG, hybrid – we support Any GTM strategy
There is no one-size-fits-all selling strategy! Whether you are sales-led, product-led, sales-assisted, or something in between, we’ve got you covered.
![Icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20150%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Gives sellers context around what makes a lead hot
Just say no to black box solutions! Sellers can access a detailed breakdown around what fit and intent data was used to generate every score.
![Icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20150%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Access insights that improve funnel efficiency
Provide operators with deep, meaningful insights—not vanity metrics—about the quality of leads entering and progressing through your funnel.
![Icon](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20150%20150'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
#### Machine learning serves as your data scientist sidekick
Understand which attributes are the best predictors of revenue today, while machine learning gets smarter over time as more data is introduced.
## Your success is our mission
Our team’s mission is to drive successful outcomes for our customers. To do so, we act as an extension of your team to improve your data strategy, build objective-based models, and ensure that scores are being used to maximize revenue growth!

**Company Overview: Breadcrumbs.io**

**Founded**: 2020  
**Location**: San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size**: 20 employees  
**Group Partner**: NAN  
**Y Combinator Batch**: S21  
**Website**: [Breadcrumbs.io](http://www.breadcrumbs.io)  
**Industry Tags**: Analytics, No-code, San Francisco Bay Area

---

### Mission

Breadcrumbs.io is on a mission to empower sales teams by providing a no-code scoring engine that uncovers the most engaged upsell opportunities. The platform analyzes customer and prospect data swiftly, allowing teams to focus on the right opportunities at the right time.

### What They Do

Initially starting as a tool for analyzing customer data, Breadcrumbs has evolved into a comprehensive revenue acceleration platform. Here’s what sets it apart:

1. **Rapid Setup**: Their no-code solution can be up and running in minutes rather than months, enabling businesses to start reaping benefits almost immediately.
  
2. **Lead Scoring Model**: The platform harnesses machine learning to automate lead scoring, generating deep insights about customer engagement, and highlighting upsell opportunities.
  
3. **Data Integration**: Breadcrumbs connects seamlessly with existing tech stacks (think Hubspot, Salesforce, and others), facilitating easy data consolidation and analysis without heavy reliance on developer resources.

4. **Flexibility**: Businesses can build custom lead scoring models tailored for different strategies like acquisition, expansion, and retention, empowering teams to pivot quickly as market dynamics shift.

5. **Sales-Marketing Alignment**: The tool promotes clearer communication between sales and marketing teams, replacing old “horse trading” practices with data-driven dialogues.

### Key Features

- **Copilot**: An assistant that simplifies the lead-scoring model creation, streamlining the process to just a few clicks while keeping it customizable.
  
- **Reveal & Compare Tools**: These features use predictive attributes to validate hypotheses, ensuring that teams can refine their strategies quickly and effectively.
  
- **Unlimited Workspaces**: Businesses can explore multiple models without constraints, facilitating a broader understanding of their market potential.

### Value Proposition

With Breadcrumbs, companies not only gain a sophisticated scoring engine but also a partner in optimizing their entire funnel. It supports various go-to-market (GTM) strategies—be it sales-led, product-led, or hybrid—ensuring flexibility in how businesses approach their sales processes.

### Conclusion

Breadcrumbs.io isn’t just about scoring leads; it's about transforming how sales teams operate by leveraging data for enhanced decision-making. As they continue to grow, their focus remains steadfast on driving successful outcomes for clients, making every engagement an opportunity for growth. If you're curious about a demo, visit them at [Breadcrumbs.io](http://www.breadcrumbs.io) and start uncovering hidden revenue opportunities.
